issues.description: The REQ-GROUP-009 comment on line 289 references the wrong requirement. REQ-GROUP-009 is for LLM API failure handling with retry option. The reject/reinterpret functionality is covered by REQ-GROUP-007.

Line 234 comment references 'REQ-GROUP-011' for error handling, but REQ-GROUP-011 states students should enter a nickname to join. The correct requirement for API error handling with retry is REQ-GROUP-009.
